name: indelible
content:

An indelible mark or substance is impossible to remove by washing or in any other way: indelible inkindelible mark The blood had left an indelible mark on her shirt.
[ before noun ] Indelible memories or actions are impossible to forget, or have a permanent influence or effect: indelible memory I have an indelible memory of that meeting with Anastasia.indelible impression In his 20 years working for the company, Joe Pearson made an indelible impression on it.
